text: Gei Au gu gidee nia huaidu o nia soukohp o Jerusalem, nia mee ala e haihai go digaula la koia e huaidu gi nonua loo.23.14 Genesis 18.20; Ezekiel 16.49 Digaula e hai di huaidu hai be di manu, gei e kai tilikai. Digaula e hagamaamaa nia daangada gi heia di huaidu, malaa, deai tangada e mee di lawa gi daha mo di huaidu ai. Mai gi di Au, digaula guu hai digau huaidu gadoo be digau Sodom, guu hai digau huaidu gadoo be digau Gomorrah.”
